verbs.description: There [V: is] [ARG1: no crisis] . Trump is scrambling to respond to a border emergency that exists only in conservatives ' imaginations .
There is no crisis . Trump [V: is] scrambling to respond to a border emergency that exists only in conservatives ' imaginations .
There is no crisis . [ARG0: Trump] is [V: scrambling] [ARG1: to respond to a border emergency that exists only in conservatives ' imaginations] .
There is no crisis . [ARG0: Trump] is scrambling to [V: respond] [ARG1: to a border emergency that exists only in conservatives ' imaginations] .
There is no crisis . Trump is scrambling to respond to [ARG1: a border emergency] [R-ARG1: that] [V: exists] [ARGM-LOC: only in conservatives ' imaginations] .
